name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Halloween backgrounds and stickers for video calls and chats

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cute and spooky free halloween backgrounds for video calls, online meetings, and streaming sessions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥 Enjoy our 2024 collection of high-quality image and video backgrounds and stickers—all free, without watermark and sign ups!

👍 Easy installation and usage
1. Install the extension by clicking the "Add to Chrome" button
2. Go the website and start a video session
3. Click the "puzzle" icon in the top right corner of your browser and pin the extension 
4. Click the extension icon to open its interface
5. Grant access to your camera (the extension does not collect or store any data)
6. Pick an image or video you like and use it as a background, or watermark your video with a sticker.
Your settings will be saved for future video calls, but you can change them anytime.

🛠️ Troubleshooting:
- Applying a background or a sticker for the first time, it may take a few seconds for the magic to happen.
- Depending on the website you're using, you may notice that a text in backgrounds and stickers may be mirrored, but don't worry - your audience will see it in the right direction.

⭐️ Key Features
🎬 Replace your background with an image or animated background 
🎥 Watermark your video stream with a sticker
🚀 Easy to install and so simple to use
💥 All free, without watermark and sign ups!
🎯 Works seamlessly with over 93 video platforms—simply use it in Chrome browser with your favorite website:
 - Video conferencing platforms
 - Video chats and dating websites 
 - Online learning and webinars services 
 - other platforms

⭐️Top Use cases
▸ Spice up your online meetings, video calls and streams with spooky and adorable halloween backgrounds and stickers.

Add a splash of holiday fun to your online video presence and stand out using our best 2024 Halloween backgrounds!

The winter is coming... get ready for our cozy Christmas and Winter collection!
